titles.title: Recognizing the 100th anniversary of FarmHouse Fraternity, Inc.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.
Miss McMorris moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.

reference.label: text of measure as introduced in House

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 207.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/21/2005--Passed House without amendment. Recognizes the 100th anniversary of FarmHouse Fraternity, Inc. Commends the fraternity and its members for a century of service.
